Network connection problems encountered during search.

org.eclipse.update.internal.core.CoreExceptionWithRootCause: Unable to access site: "http://fullmoon.torolab.ibm.com/releases/europa/site.xml" [Server returned HTTP response code: "404 Not Found" for URL: http://fullmoon.torolab.ibm.com/releases/europa/site.xml.]

I am guessing that either the site does not exist or there is a typo in the mirror, but this mirror choice was presented to me by the update manager... Maybe the error message should be something more like "The selected mirror cannot be found" or something like that? 

Also maybe there could be some validation for mirror choices prior to them being shown to the user, or on the page previous to selecting a mirror there could be a checkbox like "validate mirror existence", that way users don't have the option of selecting mirrors that don't exist.
